title: Kids love Poros!
body: I showed my kids the {{champion:201}} reveal movie it was all down hill from there.  My daughter has even made poro puppets with mustaches since they have been fed by Braum  :).  These were made by my girlfriend that also plays :)

replies.body: Haha, love it. Also would love to see you both playing with the loldads if you like, see www.reddit.com/r/loldads.
Oh my god! I want one! D:
That is adorable. ^_^  Such awesome Poro love.
